effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even
the sky. This may also make the target flinch.
